description: This file defines API route handlers for inventory management operations such as creating, listing, updating, and transferring inventory items in a FastAPI application. It includes route definitions, dependency injections, and internal utility functions.

methods.name: InventoryItem _get_or_create_inventory(db: Session, product_id: int, location_id: int)
methods.description: Internal helper function to fetch an existing inventory record or create a new one if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: create_inventory(payload: InventoryCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to create or update the inventory record for a specific product and location.

methods.name: list_inventory(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve a list of all inventory records.

methods.name: update_inventory(inventory_id: int, payload: InventoryUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to update the quantity of an existing inventory record.

methods.name: transfer(product_id: int, from_location_id: int, to_location_id: int, quantity: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to transfer a quantity of a product from one location to another, updating inventory records accordingly.

ctags.name: _get_or_create_inventory
ctags.pattern: /^def _get_or_create_inventory(db: Session, product_id: int, location_id: int) -> InventoryItem:$/

ctags.name: transfer
ctags.pattern: /^def transfer(product_id: int, from_location_id: int, to_location_id: int, quantity: int, db: Ses/
ctags.signature: (product_id: int, from_location_id: int, to_location_id: int, quantity: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: update_inventory
ctags.pattern: /^def update_inventory(inventory_id: int, payload: InventoryUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))/
ctags.signature: (inventory_id: int, payload: InventoryUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
